title: Calories in a Whopper
meta_description: Discover calories in a whopper from Burger King, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and simple tweaks for variations under 160 characters.
assumptions: Standard Burger King Whopper: flame-grilled beef patty, sesame seed bun, lettuce, tomatoes, pickles, onions, mayo, ketchup; no cheese.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, recipe, size, and preparation method. Check labels or official sources when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard Whopper has about 670 kcal and 28 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a Whopper?
faqs.a: A standard Whopper contains about 670 calories.

faqs.q: What are the macros for a Whopper?
faqs.a: Approximately 51 g carbs, 28 g protein, 40 g fat.

faqs.q: Is sodium high in a Whopper?
faqs.a: Yes, around 980 mg per Whopper due to seasonings and condiments.

faqs.q: Calories in a Whopper with cheese?
faqs.a: Adding cheese increases it to about 720 kcal.

faqs.q: Does a Whopper have trans fats?
faqs.a: About 1 g of trans fat per Whopper from the beef patty.
